name: RUNNER early mini demo
description:
DISCLAIMER: THE STORY IS NOT COMPLETE.

Story: in 2069, You're one of the best parkour masters in the world! But a evil scientist named Karl wants to capture you and experiment on you at the experiment lab.  Karl once said:" i will use that parkour master to use its parkour abilities and use it on my creatures!". Karl also creates creatures and machines to become one of the best scientists in the world! One day Karl captures you and puts in a prison cell. Well you are stuck in a prison cell now, or are you?

Gameplay: *Parkour through an experiment lab and escape from the evil scientist named Karl! *Find creatures never seen before! *Battle through Karl's creations in order to escape the lab!

The game will be probably finished in 2021 mid-august.

NOTE: to hurt the boss at level 3 you have to bounce on it's head, and when he shoots the little totems you can also jump on them.
